dcterms:creator: N. T. Pardos
N. T. Heffernan
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 145 Grade 8 learners from a single school district answering a manually tagged set of 80 questions on Earth science, with only 13.5% of all graded learner–question responses observed.
dcterms:title: STEMscopes Dataset

dcterms:creator: Daniel Calderón
dcterms:description: A dataset from a high school algebra test administered on Amazon Mechanical Turk, consisting of 99 learners answering 34 questions covering topics such as geometry, equation solving, and visualizing function graphs.
dcterms:title: Amazon Mechanical Turk Algebra Test Dataset

dcterms:creator: ELEC 301, Rice University
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of responses from 15 learners answering 44 questions from the final exam of an introductory course on digital signal processing.
dcterms:title: Undergraduate DSP Course Dataset

dcterms:creator: N. T. Pardos
N. T. Heffernan
dcterms:description: A dataset used for modeling individualization in a Bayesian networks implementation of knowledge tracing.
dcterms:title: ASSISTment Dataset
